benchmark_details.name: PathPlanning from Natural Language (PPNL)
benchmark_details.overview: PPNL evaluates LLMs' spatial-temporal reasoning by formulating path planning tasks that require navigation to target locations while avoiding obstacles and adhering to constraints.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To analyze the ability of LLMs to perform spatial-temporal reasoning through path planning tasks.

data.source: Synthetic grid environments generated for path planning tasks.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the LLM's ability to navigate from initial to goal locations while avoiding obstacles.
methodology.interpretation: Higher success rates and optimal rates indicate better spatial-temporal reasoning capabilities.
methodology.validation: The benchmark is validated through controlled experiments with LLMs, comparing different models and prompting methods.
